attributes.action: MAKE NEW FLAT DEVELOPMENTS HAVE AT LEAST 1% OF THE NUMBER OF FLATS TO BE BUILT DISABLED ACCESSIBLE SO THAT MORE MONEY DOESN'T NEED TO BE SPENT MAKING THEM ADAPTABLE. WE ARE 'NORMAL' DISABLED PEOPLE, NOT OUTCASTS, WE EXIST & WE SHOULD HAVE APPROPRIATE HOUSING. EVERYONE HAS THAT RIGHT!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS A DISABLED PERSON TRYING TO MOVE, IT WILL TAKE UP TO TWO YEARS TO FIND A WHEELCHAIR ACCESSIBLE ONE BEDROOM FLAT FOR ME TO LIVE IN. HAVING TO LEAVE FROM A SHORT-TERM TENANCY, I NOW HAVE TO GO THROUGH THE COUNCIL WHICH HAVE VERY, VERY FEW SUITABLE HOMES. THERE ARE MANY GROUND FLOOR EMPTY FLATS BUT ONLY FOR SALE, NOT FOR RENT! WHY CANT MOST, IF NOT ALL GROUND FLOOR FLATS BE DISABLED FRIENDLY & ALSO ACCESSIBLE?
